rules_text:
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] – As long as you own five or more cards in exile with skull counters on them, creatures your opponents control with lesser power than Felmunt are goaded.
Whenever one or more creatures attack one of your opponents, that creatures controller exiles the top card of their library. They may play the exiled card until end of turn. Put a skull counter on each card you exile this way.
